data.text: RT @FoodAndSh_t: Asiana Airlines bibimbap: Not bad after the 14th hour on a plane http://t.co/cqDYGaCo1a
@timmehsan We're a fan of Mother Monster as well! Free ticket? Maybe next time, when we host another event. Happy Thanksgiving!
We're only a few days away from #Thanksgiving. What special plans do you have for this weekend? Who are you thankful for?
@ngelfond Thank you for such kind compliments! Following! :) Have a great rest of the week.
@pehrozk Or you may e-mail usasianaclub@flyasiana.com with your itinerary and Asiana Club account number. Thank you! :)
@pehrozk It would depend on your flight date, and the flight you would be taking. Please contact our Asiana Club department at 800-227-4262
Traveling with OZ from the US? Take advantage of our 3rd baggage promotion! Check eligibility: http://t.co/CmTWS0UuQc http://t.co/C3sJZNEExO
@LaurieFleming Oh, the woes of limitation! We'll give you credit for the shortened version, though. :)
@LaurieFleming There's an even longer version...
Random Quiz: Does anyone know the real name of BANGKOK, Thailand? #AsianaQuiz
If you haven't tried your chance at earning @StarAlliance Gold Benefits, play now! http://t.co/pEi3604MG8
@seasearch We apologize for the inconvenience of our new website, and we hope to have you back soon.
@seasearch Hello, what routes and dates are you searching for?
@gfasol You may contact our Regional HQs in Japan at the following number: (81)(3)6268-8117
@ittiming What routes and dates are you searching for?
@JohnKim98174880 Our website is available for booking. Which routes and dates are you searching for?
@onlyve We hope you enjoy your flight with us! :)
RT @onlyve: Looking forward to flying with @AsianaAirlines for the first time on Monday! Probably one of the rare Mondays that I look forwa…
@GregDB2011 Eat as much diverse dishes as you can! :)
Even on a gloomy day, the colors on our tail stand out. Hope your day is bright like the Saekdong hues on our wings! http://t.co/7UiTTUOaBl
@gfasol Our website is still undergoing maintenance due to a recent system upgrade. You may contact (800)227-4262 for help! Thank you!
@allacclife Thanks for coming on board with us! We hope to see you again soon! :)
RT @allacclife: Flew @AsianaAirlines from LAX-ICN - such amazingly friendly flight attendants! http://t.co/HQXSTpANgE
@SamTeeeee Hi Sam. Flights to CEB are operating normally. You may contact our RSVN center if you'd like to reconfirm your itinerary.
@jbeinstein Have a great journey! Happy travels! :)
@giuseppebl2 What a stunning photo! Thanks for this.
@miffSC @G_G_007 Thanks! Maybe next time both of you could relax in our lounge! :)
Do you know what a traditional Korean wedding is like? Our flight attendants demonstrate on OZ761: http://t.co/kAwwVY9Qu3 (cc: @ChielsinKo)
@G_G_007 Hope you enjoyed your stay at our lounge in ICN! :)
@mzimple Hope you enjoyed your stay at the lounge!
@crucker Of course we do! Here's @dwayntan's photo of our guidebook, included with every #Bibimbap meal: http://t.co/OrijpEHoNp
@zulilulelo It is! You should try us sometime.
@azn_Seddie Such little words, but describes us so well! :)
@SuJaeBee Where would we be if parents didn't exist? Thanks for your inspiration! #HappyThanksgiving! :)
@hyunvihae We hope your dreams continue to flourish! #HappyThanksgiving
@miffSC That's a very precious way of looking at life! #HappyThanksgiving! :)
@DJHAPPEE It's amazing! We're grateful that such a delicious dish exists! #HappyThanksgiving!
RT @DJHAPPEE: @AsianaAirlines I'm grateful for discovering "Bi Bim Bap" on an Asiana flight. It has become one of my favorite dishes.
Thanksgiving is fast approaching. Who or what are you most grateful for this year?
Have you experienced our First Suites yet? Here's a blog review of our ICN-JFK route on OZ222: http://t.co/FfXRjkbOjW
Wow! A wonderful photo of our B747 by @TrashPhotograph! http://t.co/ezlfsEMJ57 Thank you!
@dannyblue78 Awesome photo! :)
RT @dannyblue78: View from my seat. #southafrican #asiana #sa #oz #staralliance #jfk #nyc #airport #airplane #airline… http://t.co/NXhrFMmW…
How would you like to be a @StarAlliance GOLD member? Test your skills for a chance to earn elite status! http://t.co/IwKonlsPBA
@angelogem @cathaypacific Thank you.
Our new website is up and running, but there are still kinks that are being tended to. We hope to have it polished ASAP. Thank you! :)
Have you heard about our recent Business Lounge expansion at ICN Airport? Read it now: http://t.co/iAVsxqxAyT (cc: @BizTravelerNA)
@kristykim1015 Hope you're feeling better now, Kristy! Thanks for coming on board with us. :)
RT @BnguyenThomas: @AsianaAirlines I'd never been on you but I wish I could go on your first class
RT @kristykim1015: [Flight OZ 212] I had a fever & sore throat, Asiana flight attendants took a GREAT care of me, THANKS! @AsianaAirlines #…
Did you know? Our on-board chefs must complete a 9-month program at Le Cordon Bleu overseas: http://t.co/N7a7C5ACz2 http://t.co/RxmdJvlYwk
Reminder: Our services will be down SAT. Nov. 16th from 5AM until SUN. Nov. 17th, 5AM. More: http://t.co/J9HvIXf26V http://t.co/FjSRKTm4Sb
Happy Friday! Let's fly away this weekend with Saekdongi! #SaekdongiAdventures #FlyAsiana #TGIF http://t.co/BLQI5CN7Pk
We're offering a complimentary 3rd baggage for flights from the US! Eligibility:  http://t.co/vcBcmEYN9s  Book now! http://t.co/elUBpHj2LO
In efforts to support the victims of Typhoon Haiyan in the Philippines, we have sent over emergency kits via OZ709. http://t.co/JsEpojzNzZ
Our hearts continue to reach out to the millions of people affected by typhoon Haiyan in the Philippines. <3
@02250514 Why, thank you! :)
RT @vcdxnz001: @AsianaAirlines Who needs playing cards these days when your onboard entertainment system is so good?
@syerassi The trusty toiletries on board our aircraft are sure to keep you in prime condition. :)
@vcdxnz001 Well silly us! We were thinking analog-minded.
@vcdxnz001 A deck of cards? We couldn't agree more! Simple entertainment that goes a long way. :)
@purpleCapybara Wow! Any books you'd recommend on a long journey? :)
We'd like to know: what are your 3 travel essentials?
We're offering a complimentary 3rd baggage for flights from the US! Eligibility:  http://t.co/vcBcmEYN9s Book now! http://t.co/elUBpHj2LO
@WAVEJourney It seems like we've been counting down with you forever now! Enjoy! :)
@ilovetravellin Welcome aboard! Hope you enjoy your journey with us. :)
Anybody know what it's like to earn @StarAlliance #GOLD status? Play the Star game to earn Gold status for free: http://t.co/pEi3604MG8
Asiana's solar-powered streetlamp lights up Myanmar! http://t.co/Nnr97DMfM5 http://t.co/XIvJ1NRCFo
Interested in #Frankfurt? Read all about its beauty in our November issue of ASIANA in-flight magazine! http://t.co/bEE6SqKwuc
RT @Webjet_US: Day two of our sweepstakes where you you can enter to 2 FREE tickets to one of 7 destinations with @AsianaAirlines! http://t…
For a limited time, Asiana is offering a 3rd complimentary bag to travelers flying on our economy class! More info: http://t.co/vcBcmEYN9s
[NEWS] Asiana is launching a next-generation passenger service system. Note: services will be limited. http://t.co/rPoTTiajJU
We can't forget the Veterans that have fought for their country. Thank you, and you are always appreciated! #VeteransDay
It's 11/11! Happy Peppero Day from your friends at Asiana Airlines! May your day be full of love <3 http://t.co/LvaTSESt99
RT @Webjet_US: Asia Experience Sweepstakes: Vote to win 2 FREE tickets to one of 7 destinations on @AsianaAirlines! Vote here: http://t.co/…
It's a rainy day in ICN, but our fleet is ready to take you on board our wings, #FLYasiana #asianaairlines http://t.co/1BletSZvlj
@ItsDanielJae Thanks again for participating! Glad you like your prize :)
RT @frankus0512: Flying with @AsianaAirlines with a baby - #friendly and #smiles every where!
@SuJaeBee Thank you! We love to bring a smile on our customers' faces! :)
@ItsDanielJae Our tracking # indicates you have received your prize and was signed for. Let us know ifyou have any questions! :) thanks!!
@sungsik68 We agree, and our webpage is currently being updated! Thanks for your patience and we hope to serve you better! :)
@junkieaircraft Summer of 2014!
@SolKornfeld We're glad you flew with us! We hope to see you again soon!
@miguelangelv222 Hello!
@sidneywho Maybe someday!
The 11th Annual Asiana International Short Film Festival Nov. 7-12 in Seoul, Korea. Check out video: http://t.co/g1EqK4jGky via @youtube
Hit the town and visit Cheongyecheon, a hot spot for foreigners and natives alike! http://t.co/waX2DGtvPV

Saekdongi likes visiting traditional houses in Korea. Where will you go with OZ? #SaekdongiAdventures #AsianaAirlines
http://t.co/989aa15WIU
@mortenmo You can either contact our reservation center prior to your flight or input it upon check-in at the airport.
@ItsDanielJae We will check with the tracking number and update you with results soon. Thank you!
Asiana Family at 인천공항 Incheon Airport. http://t.co/uTO5XcH3pV
Korea's Seoul blending history and modernity in autumn. Photo courtesy of Korea Tourism Organization http://t.co/H3CoA65fqC
The colors are in full effect in Korea! Fly into ICN via Asiana and take in the beauty of nature. Happy Tuesday! http://t.co/tWUA8webUT
RT @planemadblog: The first @Airbus #A380 for @AsianaAirlines has emerged out of the final assembly line in Toulouse! http://t.co/0H8k4YkM2P
@WillyPeeps Welcome aboard and happy flying! :)
@candiiewish thank you SO MUCH for participating our evernt !!
Good morning and Happy Monday! What are your travel plans for the week?
